name: DeFinity
description: DeFinity is a decentralised DeFi exchange, specialised to trade traditional and digital FX via smart contracts, with a focus to provide real-time settlement and clearing for spot FX trading. Bridging the power of decentralisation with a traditional broker and liquidity provider community, it is specifically tailored and geared towards the future support of CBDCâ€™s (central bank digital currencies) and decentralised financial services for FX.
